sentence.Network_en: Ljcyc 2 shares the similar asymmetry expression pattern as Cyc in Antirrhinum majusduring the floral primordia development.
sentence.Network_cn: 提示Ljcyc2不仅与花的不对称性发育紧密相关,而且也参与了豆科花序原基的发育.

sentence.Network_en: The article reviews the recent progress of flower development in Antirrhinum and Arabidopsis.
sentence.Network_cn: 以金鱼草和拟南芥菜为例,介绍近年高等植物花发育的研究进展.

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Latin, from Greek antirrhinon, from anti- 'counterfeiting' + rhis, rhin- 'nose', from the resemblance of the flower to an animal's snout

means.word_mean: 1. a genus of herbs of the family Scrophulariaceae with brightly colored irregular flowers
